item.title: Java Fundamentals (Part 4)
item.description: Explore the key differences between ArrayLists and LinkedLists.

item.title: Java Fundamentals (Part 3)
item.description: A brief introduction on test-driven development (TDD).

item.title: Full-stack Web Development: The Odin Project
item.description: Learning notes on the Odin project.

item.title: Java Fundamentals (Part 2)
item.description: Dive into the distinctions and practical uses of static and final modifiers in Java. Discover the intricacies of arrays versus lists, and understand the fundamental differences between interfaces and their implementations.

item.title: Classical Encryption Techniques
item.description: Let's dive into classical encryption techniques: from Caesar's simple shifts to more complex methods like the Playfair and Vigen√®re Ciphers, we'll see how each technique works and why they matter.

item.title: Number Theory
item.description: Number theory is about integers and their properties. This blog post covers everything from the basics of divisibility and the Division Algorithm to advanced concepts like modular arithmetic, prime numbers, the renowned theorems of Fermat and Euler, Miller-Rabin algorithm, and the Chinese Remainder Theorem.

item.title: Java Fundamentals (Part 1)
item.description: Explore the essentials of object-oriented programming in Java, from core terminologies to Java-specific elements.

item.title: Information and Network Security Concepts
item.description: An exploration of computer security, delving into the OSI security architecture, various security attacks, and models for network protection. This guide also covers essential security services, mechanisms, potential attack surfaces, and principles

item.title: Building a Data Visualization Web App with Dash
item.description: Journey with the Mathbridge project at Virginia Tech: Delve into the creation of an interactive web application for linear algebra and machine learning visualization.

item.title: Machine Learning for Profile-Matching System
item.description: Explore machine learning solutions for optimized buyer-seller matchmaking in a SaaS platform.

item.title: Designing Machine Learning Systems: A Summary
item.description: Delve into an in-depth review of Chip Huyen's insights on building robust machine learning systems, inspired by her best-selling book on MLOps.

item.title: S.O.L.I.D Principles Explained
item.description: Robert C. Martin (Uncle Bob)'s S.O.L.I.D principles in software engineering explained with Python examples through the lense of web development and machine learning applications.

item.title: Multi-Task Learning for Image Classification
item.description: (Hard-parameter sharing) multi-task learning for image classification compared between vision transformers (ViT) and deep residual network (ResNet-152).

item.title: System Design Fundamentals Note
item.description: Notes on fundamentals system design concepts, collected from Sahn Lam's lecture series
